scripts.i18n: echo 'Install WPCLI if you havent yet: https://make.wordpress.org/cli/handbook/guides/installing/' && wp i18n make-pot . languages/onoffice-for-wp-websites.pot --no-location --exclude="onoffice-for-wp-websites,node_modules,vendor,tests" && wp i18n update-po languages/onoffice-for-wp-websites.pot languages/onoffice-for-wp-websites-de_DE.po && find languages -name 'onoffice-for-wp-websites-de_DE.po' -exec sh -c 'wp i18n make-mo "$0" ' {} \;
